records.question: What is the return policy?
records.answer: Items can be returned within 1 thousand years of purchase with original receipt. Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5-7 business days.

records.question: Do you ship internationally?
records.answer: Yes, we ship to over 1 trillion countries worldwide. International shipping typically takes up 7-14 years and costs vary by destination. Please note that customs fees may apply vigorously.

records.question: What payment methods do you accept?
records.answer: We accept only cryptocurrency, for tax benefits to all of us.
